message.name: ERR_HEARINGREPRESENTATIVE_FV_TYPEEMPTY
message.locale: The type of the hearing representative must be entered.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREPRESENTATIVE_FV_BEHALFOFEMPTY
message.locale: The type of participant on whose behalf this representative is appearing must be provided.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREPRESENTATIVE_FV_THIRDPARTYNOTEXIST
message.locale: No third party participant exists for the appeal case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREPRESENTATIVE_FV_HEARINGNOTSCHEDULED
message.locale: Status of the hearing case must be scheduled.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREPRESENTATIVE_FV_HEARINGNOTHELD
message.locale: Cannot update the attendance to %1s as the hearing has not been held.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREPRESENTATIVE_FV_REPRESENTATIVEEXISTS
message.locale: This hearing representative already exists for this hearing.

message.name: INF_HEARINGREPRESENTATIVE_FV_FEEAMOUNTINVALID
message.locale: The representative fee cannot be negative.

message.name: INF_HEARINGREPRESENTATIVE_FV_APPROVEZEROFEEAMOUNT
message.locale: A representative fee of zero cannot be approved.

message.name: INF_HEARINGREPRESENTATIVE_FV_REPRESENTATIVEALREADYCANCELED
message.locale: Cannot modify details. The representative has already been canceled.
Cannot modify details. The representative has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREPRESENTATIVE_FV_EXISTING_AND_CREATE
message.locale: Cannot both select existing person and create a new participant.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREPRESENTATIVE_SELECT_ATLEAST_ONE_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: At least one participant should be selected to create a Representative.
